## JSONObject.createRichText() method

Don't use createRichText directly. Be sure to use it through a proxy. The reason for setting the RichText type as the return value is to provide the RichText interface to the user.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
createRichText(key: string): RichText;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | string |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

[RichText](./yorkie-js-sdk.richtext.md)
